name: Lucky Chant
effect: Screen Move. The User and Allies instead take regular damage from Critical Hits. If 2 or more Critical Hits are prevented by Lucky Chant, reduce the remaining duration of Lucky Chant by 1 (this effect only triggers once per Round). Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The user chants an incantation to the skies. The beautiful performance grants this pokemon and it's allies divine protection. Sometimes good things happen~
